name: $Froge
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

$Froge is a retro wave voxel-style idle clicker game about pump and dump crypto frauds. 

- Spam PUMP! to drive up the prices, 

- Then DUMP! to leave those sucker whales in your dust and collect your money in your WALLET. 

- You can buy UPGRADES with your money from your wallet.

- When you've made your quick buck, CREATE A NEW CRYPTO fraud to start all over again! 

How rich can you get?
